actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the gross income of an employee shall not include amounts directly or indirectly received as payment or reimbursement for legal services under group legal service plans, the value of legal services rendered under such plans, or contributions by employers to such plans.

summary.text: Provides, under the Internal Revenue Code, that the gross income of an employee shall not include amounts directly or indirectly received as payment or reimbursement for legal services under group legal service plans, the value of legal services rendered under such plans, or contributions by employers to such plans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the gross income of an employee shall not include amounts directly or indirectly received as payment or reimbursement for legal services under group legal service plans, the value of legal services rendered under such plans, or contributions by employers to such plans.
